## 3번
```{r}
mu <- 70
sigma <- 8
pnorm(90, mean=mu, sd=sigma)-pnorm(80, mean=mu, sd=sigma)
```
<br><br>
## 4번
```{r}
mu <- 1.5
sigma <- 2
H0<-pnorm(1, mean=mu, sd=sigma)-pnorm(0, mean=mu, sd=sigma)
H2<-pnorm(3, mean=mu, sd=sigma)-pnorm(2, mean=mu, sd=sigma)
H0+H2
```
